word: Wow, who do we have here? I feel like we're already friends, dear customer, so I'm happy to sell you a ticket at 10% off. Have a seat here, and have some Xu Heng barley tea on the house!
Oh hello! Thank you for honoring me with your presence! But um, there's the small matter of the admission fee... How much, you ask? Don't worry, I have a special VIP price for you!
Welcome! Come on in, come on in! it's cold outside!
Heh, you can try again. There's no problem you can't solve with money!
Just a little bit more to the grand prize... A scam, you say? Not true at all! We've always been known for the honest way we do our business!
Oh no, you were so close... you're looking for a lucky string bracelet, you say? Ha, you've come to the right place! Tell you what, I'll give you a 5% discount since we're friends. Take it!
Congratulations! How does it feel to win the prize? There's more good stuff coming your way, so keep your eyes peeled!
Are you the Chosen One? How did you win it so fast???
You have no idea how many customers before you have tried and tried to get this... Ugh, this one's not good for my bottom line.
They say it's poor form to talk about money. I say it's even poorer form not to.
You know what brings the money in? Ha ha! I'm talking about the customers that throng the evening market, of course!

Deceptive marketing? Aieee, you misunderstand!!! The point of a promotional event is to make the customer feel good: not only do they get the good they want, they get to experience the joy of playing too. That's not selling a lie, is it?
